None.Name: Ritual of Rebirth
None.Description: Activate to trigger a global heal spell. Every friendly unit in the current game will regenerate 20 life points every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. Has a 60 seconds cool-down after the weapon was built. Reusable every 60 seconds.
